heading.emphasis:
Aphanotorulus rubrocauda Oliveira, Rapp Py-Daniel & Zawadzki, 2017
: e160034[3], fig. 1.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Paratypes :
2 lots, 10 specimens —NUP 7458, 4, 125.3– 215.5 mm SL; NUP 7785, 6, 158.5– 234.5 mm SL: Brazil , Mato Grosso , Aripuanã , unnamed small stream, tributary of igarapé Guaribal , rio Aripuanã basin, 10°06’35”S , 59°26’12”W , I. M. Fernandes ,
19 May 2008
.
